verses.name: Job 33:19
verses.text: He is chastened also with pain upon his bed, and the multitude of his bones with strong pain:

verses.name: Job 33:20
verses.text: So that his life abhorreth bread, and his soul dainty meat.

verses.name: Job 33:21
verses.text: His flesh is consumed away, that it cannot be seen; and his bones that were not seen stick out.

verses.name: Job 33:22
verses.text: Yea, his soul draweth near unto the grave, and his life to the destroyers.

verses.name: Job 33:23
verses.text: If there be a messenger with him, an interpreter, one among a thousand, to shew unto man his uprightness:
